column4: *hmm ... * I was hoping to find some help ... scunizi or anybody, please?
some help on how to start an IRC channel, please?
/join #channel-name
explain more, please
I KNOW, RIGHT? NO NEED TO SHOUT.
Further IRC-related questions go to #freenode.
so I just type "#freenode"?
& IdelOne: Thanks guys, but, obviously, I am new to this thing :)
To join a channel, type /join #channel-name
& IdleOne: will I leave this "room" and not talk to you guys anymore? (I sort of like the talk here)
If the channel did not exist, it will be created automatically.
So now join #freenode.
No, you can be in as many channels as you want.
(Technically, there _is_ a limit of channels per network, but it doesn't matter yet.)
& IdleOne: I feel at home already! So, IRC works, really! Cool stuff man!
& IdleOne: Thanks a million guys and (grawity: thanks for accepting my apologies!)
& IdleOne: I successfully joined the freenode ... but it's sort of quiet in there ... :)
#freenode is a help channel - and it's only active when people ask for help
& IdleOne: Now I get it!
& IdleOne: internet is sort of slooow here and the lines are freezing on my screen; but here's a question how can I install 1)a webcam [logitech] on Ubuntu 2) a ZTE wireless modem 3G?
& IdleOne: thanx but cnxn is really bad; will try again later! g'd nite!
